Author: jazminonacloud
Text: Try not to be too hard on him. I haven’t broached the subject with my partner whatsoever and we’ve been together for 5 years.   It’s not an easy thing for people to understand or empathize with if they haven’t had a lot of exposure to it.  I know it’s frustrating and may seem like he doesn’t care but the fact that he even notices your eating habits shows that he cares about you.
